blogPost.title: What can small businesses learn from the smash success of giants like Starbucks and McDonald’s? Answer by @Tiffani_Bova, Growth & Innovation Evangelist, Speaker and Author. https://t.co/KfHqcrkjA7 https://t.co/uWv1LtIhsy
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: スターバックスやマクドナルドの大成功から、中小企業は何を学ぶべきか？Answer by @Tiffani_Bova, Growth & Innovation Evangelist, Speaker and Author. https://t.co/KfHqcrkjA7 https://t.co/uWv1LtIhsy
小企业可以从星巴克和麦当劳等巨头的巨大成功中学到什么？回答者：@Tiffani_Bova，成长与创新传道者、演讲者和作者。https://t.co/KfHqcrkjA7 https://t.co/uWv1LtIhsy
小企業可以從星巴克和麥當勞等巨頭的巨大成功中學到什麼？回答者：@Tiffani_Bova，成長與創新傳道者、演講者和作者。https://t.co/KfHqcrkjA7 https://t.co/uWv1LtIhsy

previous.title: How is the startup scene in New York different from Silicon Valley? Answer by @florentp, founder of @smalldoorvet. https://t.co/j3qQHmdNdY https://t.co/izwGT7nWLK

localize.full_text: ニューヨークのスタートアップシーンは、シリコンバレーとどう違うのでしょうか？答えは、@smalldoorvetの創業者である@florentp氏。https://t.co/j3qQHmdNdY https://t.co/izwGT7nWLK
纽约的创业环境与硅谷有什么不同？回答者：@florentp，@smalldoorvet的创始人。https://t.co/j3qQHmdNdY https://t.co/izwGT7nWLK
紐約的創業環境與硅谷有什麼不同？回答者：@florentp，@smalldoorvet的創始人。https://t.co/j3qQHmdNdY https://t.co/izwGT7nWLK

next.title: What advice would you give to young people today with ambitions to hold a C-suite position? Answer by @WhitneyBouck, COO of @HelloSign. https://t.co/vmdprinr7X https://t.co/LxXgxIj6AU

localize.full_text: C-suiteポジションを目指す今の若い人たちにアドバイスをお願いします。Answer by @WhitneyBouck, COO of @HelloSign. https://t.co/vmdprinr7X https://t.co/LxXgxIj6AU
你对现在有志于担任C-suite职位的年轻人有什么建议？回答者：@WhitneyBouck，@HelloSign的首席运营官。https://t.co/vmdprinr7X https://t.co/LxXgxIj6AU
你對現在有志於擔任C-suite職位的年輕人有什麼建議？回答者：@WhitneyBouck，@HelloSign的首席運營官。https://t.co/vmdprinr7X https://t.co/LxXgxIj6AU
